title: About Me
description: As a frontend developer with extensive experience, I specialize in crafting visually appealing and user-friendly websites. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and jQuery, I have successfully delivered numerous projects, ensuring optimal functionality and aesthetics. My backend skills in SQL Server and Asp.Net (MVC) complement my frontend expertise, enabling me to create seamless, end-to-end solutions. With a track record of delivering high-quality work and a commitment to staying updated with the latest technologies, I am well-equipped to meet your project requirements effectively.
